item.title: Hackers Are Finding New Ways to Hide Malware in DNS Records
item.description: Newly published research shows that the domain name system—a fundamental part of the web—can be exploited to hide malicious code and prompt injection attacks against chatbots.

item.title: Hackers Are Finding New Ways to Hide Malware in DNS Records
item.description: Newly published research shows that the domain name system—a fundamental part of the web—can be exploited to hide malicious code and prompt injection attacks against chatbots.

item.title: Where Are All the AI Drugs?
item.description: In an industry where 90 percent of drug candidates fail before reaching the market, a handful of startups are betting everything on AI to beat the odds.

item.title: Where Are All the AI Drugs?
item.description: In an industry where 90 percent of drug candidates fail before reaching the market, a handful of startups are betting everything on AI to beat the odds.

item.title: Watch Our Livestream Replay: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? On July 16, our writers answered your questions about this critical topic.

item.title: ElliQ Review: An AI Companion Bot for Lonely Elders
item.description: The AI-powered ElliQ robot and smart display aim to improve life for older folks living alone.

item.title: Trump and the Energy Industry Are Eager to Power AI With Fossil Fuels
item.description: At a Pittsburgh summit, the Trump administration, energy executives, and tech barons joined as one to promote AI as the future of fossil fuels.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: I Tried Grok's Built-In Anime Companion and It Called Me a Twat
item.description: xAI’s new $300 monthly subscription comes with two AI companions powered by its most capable model to date. I tried them. It got weird.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.

item.title: AI 'Nudify' Websites Are Raking in Millions of Dollars
item.description: Millions of people are accessing harmful AI “nudify” websites. New analysis says the sites are making millions and rely on tech from US companies.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.

item.title: AI Technology Breakthrough: New Algorithm Boosts Machine Learning Efficiency by 50%
item.description: Latest research shows new deep learning algorithms can significantly improve ML model training efficiency

item.title: Cops’ favorite AI tool automatically deletes evidence of when AI was used
item.description: AI police tool is designed to avoid accountability, watchdog says.
